title.narrative: Jaffna and Kilinochchi Water Supply and Sanitation Project

description.narrative: The loan will implement a project to provide safe drinking water to the population of the city of Jaffna and its surrounding urban and rural area, estimated to contain 300,000 people, and sanitation facilities to approximately 80,000 people.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of City Planning and Water Supply (formerly Ministry of Water Supply and Drainage)
National Water Supply and Drainage Board
State Ministry of Provincial Councils & Local Government Affairs (formerly Ministry of Public Services, Provincial Councils and Local Government)

90% of the water quality tests meet the country standards
